p: In the current study, the actinomycetal mediated synthesis of nanoparticles was optimized by adding 1 mM pure AgNO 3 solution to the washed cell-free extract, incubated for 24 h, at 35 °C (pH = 9). The extracellular synthesis of nanomaterials was inferred by the color of the liquid shifting from colorless to yellowish-brown ( Figure 2B–D). Silver nitrate solution and/or biomass filtrate were tested as a negative control and did not exhibit any color change after the incubation periods. The reduction of Ag + to Ag 0 could be attributed to an electron released as a result of reducing NO 3 to NO 2 by metabolites involved in the biomass filtrate [ 29, 30]; therefore, Ag-NPs color intensity was correlated with the number of reduced silver ions.
